summary: This mod adds a reasonable facsimile of Lucian (Michael Sheen) to your game. His perks and spells are centered around sword play and lycanthropy. He is located at the Moorside Inn in Morthal.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m38/novapd44/Lucian3.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[center][b][size= 8 ][color=saddlebrown][font=timesnewroman]-Lucian Companion from UNDERWORLD-[/font][/color][/b][/center][/size]

[b][color= peru][size= 4 ]Lucian was a request and since I dont do many male companions I figured I would give it a shot. He is located in Morthal at the Moorside Inn and is available as a calculated level 40 or Auto-Level lycanthrope. He will only change if you use the Tales of Lycanthropy mod or the authors other mod Werewolf Followers.  I did the best that I could do to get him to look remotely like his namesake. Vanilla parts and meshes really don\'t lend themselves to making male characters look like the actor that played Lucian.[/b][/color][/size]  

[b][color= wheat]
Armor: He is wearing Linwe\'s Armor - Which can be had by console \"Help Linwe\" 
Location: He is located in Morthal at the Moorside Inn
Combat: He uses Dual Flurry and Werewolf abilities (when turned)... 
Voice: Nord -it was the best I could come up with
[/b][/color]

Tales of Lycanthropy - Werewolf Overhaul by Brevi:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12687
Werewolf followers by Brevi
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11459

[B][COLOR=GHOSTWHITE]Thanks for checking out my mod and please endorse him if you like him! :) 

Regards,

FB[/b][/color]
author: FalmerBane
